alert.note: Alert for Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 5:53PM EDT until July 20 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 452 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Eglin Air Force Base, or 10 miles northeast of Niceville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Oakwood Hills, Pleasant Ridge, Alpine Heights, New Home, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill and Mossy Head. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
